credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: "The Mermaid Window", Design for Stained Glass Window for the A.H. Barney Residence, New York, NY
medium: Colored crayons, brush and gold paint on off white wove paper, three sheets mounted together
description: Narrow flanking panel for central composition. Pearl rocaille escutcheon swings from branch of under water plant, with fish swimming about. Large scallop shell at bottom.
name: Drawing
